work.work_subtitle: A collection of the most impactful projects, chosen to represent quality and dedication in every detail. Explore some of my best results.

projects.name: Fullstack Vehicle Manager ‚Äì EPTA Test
projects.description: Fullstack app for vehicle management with JWT auth, dashboard, and CRUD. Next.js, React, Node.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL. Deployed on Railway.

projects.name: Restaurant Platform
projects.description: Development of a comprehensive restaurant management platform with secure Stripe integration for payment processing, JWT authentication for secure login, and a robust admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies such as React, Vite, and Axios on the front end, and Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and Prisma on the back end, ensuring high performance, security, and scalability.

projects.name: 31Hamburgueria
projects.description: Landing page developed for the 31Hamburguer restaurant, using Vue.js and TailwindCSS. The page was designed with a focus on converting visitors into customers, presenting the menu clearly, highlighting promotions, and facilitating contact with the establishment. The layout was optimized for fast and intuitive navigation, ensuring a great user experience on both mobile and desktop devices.

projects.name: Pet Management System
projects.description: Development of a complete pet management system with CRUD functionalities, using Next.js. The project was created for a selection process, demonstrating experience in backend and frontend development with a focus on performance and scalability.

projects.name: PortSoftware - Prospecting and Paid Traffic
projects.description: Institutional page for my software house, PortSoftware. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and ShadCN, it showcases my landing page development and paid traffic management services, with a strong focus on conversion. Through this structure, I independently prospected over 50 clients, achieving a closing rate of approximately 32% (16 completed projects).

projects.name: Physiotherapy Landing Page
projects.description: A modern and responsive landing page, created with React and Tailwind to optimize user experience and ensure high performance. Focused on conversion and security, it includes integration with SSL certificates to protect data and strengthen the brand's digital presence.

projects.name: Psychology Landing Page
projects.description: Responsive landing page for a psychologist couple, designed to maximize client conversion. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and custom components, it offers intuitive navigation and optimized presentation of services.

projects.name: Sales Growth Planner
projects.description: A mobile application developed with React Native, Expo, and TypeScript, designed to organize and display daily activities to boost sales. It uses React Calendar to show specific tasks and tips for each day, helping users focus on growth strategies. The integration with axios enables real time updates of tips and activities.

projects.name: Honda Motorcycle Consortium Landing Page - Catalano Motos
projects.description: Optimized landing page for Honda motorcycle consortiums at Catalano Motos. React and Tailwind CSS focused on performance and UX/UI, resulting in 23 consortiums closed with average CPC of R$0,28.

projects.name: Grill Burgueria - Commercial Website
projects.description: Website developed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, focused on mobile-first UX/UI. Payment API integration and online menu, resulting in 85% increase in service efficiency.

projects.name: Movies Application
projects.description: Development of an application that performs GET requests to an external movie API using Axios. The application displays detailed information about movies, including star ratings and relevant data, providing an interactive and informative experience for the user.

projects.name: Dog Breed Matcher
projects.description: Application that fetches images of dog breeds from an API. Each image allows users to compare the appearance of the breed with their own dog, aiding in visual identification and exploring breed diversity. Developed with React and Axios.
